node.statement: For the second term: d/dt Tr[rho(t) log tau(t)] = Tr[delta_AB log tau(t)] + Tr[rho(t) D_log(tau(t))[dot_tau(t)]]. Since tau(t) = 1_A ⊗ rho(t)_B, log tau(t) = 1_A ⊗ log rho(t)_B and dot_tau(t) = 1_A ⊗ delta_B. The Fréchet derivative term gives Tr[rho(t)_B delta_B rho(t)_B^{-1}] = Tr[delta_B] = 0.
